one_reviews_text: Main menu does no work, could not play at all. Waste of time and megabytes. NOT RECOMMENDED!

Couldn't use movement controls, couldn't select anything, couldn't get a menu or start a tutorial.  Was stuck in the shack you spawn into when you start it up.  Was using a Rift S the first time, later used Revive and the Vive Cosmos.  Wuoldn't work for either of them.

You have to pay to get drag for some reason and a 1 pond fish will snap your line and you cant get better line from what i know and you can get like 2-4 fish then you can really get anymore they all just snap you line. who ever made this game has never been fishing before..

This game has potential. Mostly frustrating as being a fisherman the catching of fish in the game is not like real life. there is no drag on the real. the game tells you to put your rod down when fighting a fish and thats not how to fish. I fought the fish as if i would in real life and kept breaking the line. couldnt understand why?
Look if the game lasts long enough without freezing and having to kill it with task manager it could be OK if adjustments are made.
some bugs in it with the interactions with the bait tanks and kill tanks.
Ide be pretty dissapointed if i paid for it.
crashes alot and you need to restart you computer but other than that for free its a fun game
